LanguageData.RGK_Wall.label: wall
LanguageData.RGK_Wall.description: An impassable wall. Capable of holding up a roof.
LanguageData.RGK_Wall_Blueprint.label: wall (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_Wall_Frame.label: wall (building)
LanguageData.RGK_Wall_Frame.description: An impassable wall. Capable of holding up a roof.
LanguageData.RGK_VentWall.label: vent wall
LanguageData.RGK_VentWall.description: It's a wall where air can come in and out.
LanguageData.RGK_VentWall_Blueprint.label: vent wall (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_VentWall_Frame.label: vent wall (building)
LanguageData.RGK_VentWall_Frame.description: It's a wall where air can come in and out.
LanguageData.RGK_window.label: window
LanguageData.RGK_window.description: It's a window where you can look outside.
LanguageData.RGK_window_Blueprint_Install.label: window (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_WindowWall.label: window wall
LanguageData.RGK_WindowWall.description: A window through which light can pass through.
LanguageData.RGK_WindowWall_Blueprint.label: window wall (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_WindowWall_Frame.label: window wall (building)
LanguageData.RGK_WindowWall_Frame.description: A window through which light can pass through.
LanguageData.RGK_WoodFence.label: fence
LanguageData.RGK_WoodFence.description: A fence to trap livestock or protect it from outside beasts.
LanguageData.RGK_WoodFence_Blueprint.label: fence (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_WoodFence_Frame.label: fence (building)
LanguageData.RGK_WoodFence_Frame.description: A fence to trap livestock or protect it from outside beasts.
LanguageData.RGK_Door.label: door
LanguageData.RGK_Door.description: Divides rooms. Simple doors must be manually opened, which slows people down. The amount of slowdown depends on what the door is made of.
LanguageData.RGK_Door_Blueprint.label: door (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_Door_Frame.label: door (building)
LanguageData.RGK_Door_Frame.description: Divides rooms. Simple doors must be manually opened, which slows people down. The amount of slowdown depends on what the door is made of.
